Reviews.Title: This is a great phone
Reviews.Author: T. Wills "AzNetCowboy"
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone. The dual slider keyboards are a big plus to me. And the fact it is not a "smart" phone. The only things I had a problem was the manual which was too cursory in their coverage of the phone's options. I had to go to my Ford dealer to find out how to get the contacts downloaded to my MS SYNC. It turns out the have to be "pushed" one at a time to the SYNC system. However there is no place in the manual it explains how to do it. Now that I know how, all is fine. It was tedious and time consuming, but it worked. I'm glad I don't have a ton of contacts I call.Other things not covered in the manual are how to add optional ringtones from you computer. Turns out they can't be bigger than 300KB. This is not documented. I also want to switch from the SIM phone book to the Phone phone book as it allows more options, but so far I can figure out that option. A more complete manual sure would be better. Thank goodness for the AT&T; community blog. It sure has been useful.

Reviews.Title: I LOVED THAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: wiesman1000
Reviews.Content: Im 15 now... I used this phone for about 3 years in middle school when I texted the most. This phone was easy to use (for me at least) and just great. I just replaced it for christmas when my sister begged my dad for a smart phone. He said yes and though I was a little reluctant at first I got an android and honestly, I miss this phone. My android can be nice with internet but the keyboard sucks. THe matrix has the beast keyboard every I could text so fast without screwwing up like on a screen keyboard. I have honestly just stopped texting. I never text anymore its sad. With the matrix i sent like 20,000 texts a month. Now I honestly send like 50. Long story short great phone.

Reviews.Title: Works well for the price
Reviews.Author: MsKayG "MsKayG"
Reviews.Content: This phone is great.  I bought it for my husband as a gift and he loves it.  The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because he had some problems charging it but he figured it was the charger that malfunctioned and not the phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: jeffrey p steele
Reviews.Content: Great phone with every feature that I need, it does not take great pictures, but I really could care less about that, the only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is that it seems the battery does not last as long as other phones that I have had, but all around great product.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: E. Jensen
Reviews.Content: I've had this Pantech phone for awhile now.  And it's terrible.  I can barely hear people when I'm talking on the phone; I'm constantly going, "What? Say again?" like I'm ninety or something.  The only good thing this phone has is its keyboard and that's it.What is worse is that the battery is a cheap piece of junk.  I can't go more than a day without having to recharge it.  Now, I know smartphones take up a lot of energy, using the internet, games, texting and phone calls, but here's the catch--I barely use those features!  I've never gotten the internet on this phone and I'm not a phone person regardless.  The phone just dies from idling after 24 hours of non-use.  If I happen to use the phone--even once--I get a "bar" taken off my battery life.  From one call.Now, my ringer is only working half the time, so I only get half my calls.  I'm planning to buy a new phone here really soon, and then I plan to take this one and slam it into an unmovable object.I'm pretty tech-savvy; I'm the person my office goes to when they can't get their computer software to work properly, so don't think just because I don't have internet on my phone, I'm clueless how this device should work.  DO NOT BUY!!!

Reviews.Title: My Mom loves it
Reviews.Author: cas5533
Reviews.Content: My Mom absolutely loves this phone. She first got it when it first came out, she had that one for about 3 years. After the first one wore out she bought another one because she hated her upgrade. Just recently she just bought another replacement after she dropped the 2nd one in a puddle. She says it's a good sturdy phone, that makes it easy for her to text and hear when making phone calls.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: F. Parker "Grandma to be"
Reviews.Content: It's not an iPhone but it works great. This is the phone my 17 year old picked out for herself.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Price
Reviews.Author: Justin D. Murphy
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, because it slides two ways.  I love having actual buttons to use for making calls.  My previous phone had touch screen buttons and half time entered the wrong number.  You won't have that problem on this one.  I also love the qwerty  keyboard for texting.  It was easy to activate with ATT.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for texting!
Reviews.Author: shea rice
Reviews.Content: If you need a great phone for texting but not a smart phone with a huge monthly bill then this is the phone for you. It slides two different ways for calls and texts and has actual buttons to push so your not screwed if your touch screen cracks. The phone arrived on schedule, included charger and battery, and was fully charged for use. All I had to do is pop my SIM card in and start using my phone. This is my second keyboard phone and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Basic Phone
Reviews.Author: taco
Reviews.Content: I decided I wanted to lower my cell phone bill so we went from smart phones back to basic phones. I just did not use my smart phone as much as some people do. I like this phone because I can make calls and text. Easy and so much more economical! Very happy!

Reviews.Title: Full keyboard and telephone dialer pad
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: Didn't want a touchscreen smartphone or anything remotely like that.....when my original phone was left on my tailgate and eventually run over I went to ATT to find a suitable replacement........nothing there met my needs and they were trying to push me into a smart phone........looked on my "go to" place Amazon........  found this seller.  Had good reputation and sent me a perfect like new replacement.  VERY happy with it.

Reviews.Title: not a happy customer
Reviews.Author: patricia wells
Reviews.Content: i have had this phone for two months...i loved it up until now.....the front keyboard stopped working and the phone would shut off every time i went to use it.When I flipped it to use the qwerty keyboard it would go back to the main screen.I have tried to contact amazon to see if anything can be done but I haven't heard back and it's been a week.I have to take the battery out and put it back in and I can make one call before it stops working.The time still continues to work so it must not be the battery.

Reviews.Title: An extra always helps!
Reviews.Author: Terrence J. Campbell
Reviews.Content: An extra always helps! Cheaper than buying insurance! When you drop your old one in a glass of orange juice (happens more often than you'd think) just throw the old one away.

Reviews.Title: Pantech Matrix
Reviews.Author: country123
Reviews.Content: I did not like it because it locked up on me all the time and I would never buy another one

Reviews.Title: pantech
Reviews.Author: kathy
Reviews.Content: The service sucked... It said it was a AT&T; phone, but AT&T; isn't able to set up all my stuff, like picutre text

Reviews.Title: phones broken allready
Reviews.Author: alexoral
Reviews.Content: i received this phone used. not only did it have all the info in it from the previous owner, which i thought was just cheap. it also had water damage which i did not know about. now it dosen't even work any more.

Reviews.Title: worst phone ever
Reviews.Author: mfountain
Reviews.Content: This phone is exceptionally thick. I could not believe how thick it was when I first got it. I had to return it due to its sluggishness and thickness. Avoid at all costs.

Reviews.Title: good but a trick
Reviews.Author: H. Humble "real name:tyson h"
Reviews.Content: i like but there is a trick where you can get it to slide both ways at the same time XD

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band/3G phone in green with innovative dual slide/double keyboard design
Compatible with AT&T; Navigator GPS, Video Share, AT&T; Mobile Music, and streaming video from Cellular Video service
1.3-megapixel camera (with video capture); Bluetooth stereo music streaming; MicroSD memory expansion; access to personal email and instant messaging
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Pantech Matrix C740 Unlocked GSM Phone with Dual-Sliding Keypad, Full QWERTY Keyboard, 1.3MP Camera, Bluetooth and microSD Slot - Blue
